I was trying to help tose that have asked for it on TP.

Yeah, just keep your u|Torrent runnin' after you have 100% downloaded, and make sure the torrent is active for upload, If not you can force the upload with a Right Click Menu on the torrent. (Not the torrent file, but running one inside your Torrent program)
what the hell is this??? is this the movie or comic that comes with the augmented edition???

Thanks jesuz999.

The Augmented Edition -- available for the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and Windows PC editions of the game -- will include a forty-page artbook, a "motion graphic novel," and a bonus DVD that includes a making-of video, trailers, part of the game's soundtrack, and an animated storyboard of one of the game's trailers. 

This is the forty-page artbook, I have the making of DVD if anyone wants that posted?

Looks real to me, sad that its only 40 pages long though :(  it looks more like a game guide then an art book to me.

Thanks for the upload though, you helped me decide between buying the Augmented or the Standard edition of the game.
Great Quality. To view the 2 page spreads in Acrobat, go to View>Page Display and check "Two Page View" and "Show Cover Page in Two Page View"
Thanks marco699 for this and the OST!
